title: An apology for lovers, or, A discourse of the antiquity and lawfulnesse of love by Erastophil, no proselyte, but a native of that religion.
author: Erastophil.
notes: "To my dearest sister, Mrs. M. VV." (p. [2]-[5]) signed: Erastophil.
"To my dear Brother, upon the publishing of his Apologie for Lovers" (p. [10]-[13]) signed: F. [or P.] W.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
